name: Enslaved
description:
Your master commands you to retrieve him bones from nearby catacombs, get your armored suit and find a way through enemies and enigmas !

The suit helps you fight enemies and push through heavy obstacles, while when leaving it you will be more agile and fast. Be careful when leaving the suit : your are vulnerable but it is necessary to climb up the levels.

When leaving the suit, you are able to control it remotely. Use this advantage to be in 2 places at once and crack enigmas !

Hoping you can open it and give it a go !
